item.title: Wedding in Turin
item.description: 18:00 Wedding ceremony The ceremony takes place at the Marble Room of the City Hall of Turin. Address: Piazza Palazzo di Citt√† 5 19:00 Dinner We will have a small buffet reception at the Norman restaurant. It is a five minutes walk from the City Hall, we plan to walk the distance together. Where to stay in Turin We suggest to stay in the central area, here are some Airbnbs:

item.title: Reception in Warsaw
item.description: MAIN The reception will take place at the Boathouse restaurant. 18:00 Welcome We start the event by a welcoming you in the garden space. There will be drinks and finger food served, time to make photos together and chat. 19:30 Dinner 21:00 Party Opening of the dancefloor. Where to stay in Warsaw We suggest to stay in the central area, here are some hotels and Airbnbs: Hotel MDM Hotel Polonia
